languages.text: "Образец, ты, вероятно, заметил{mf||а}..." {n}Конечности гемункула синхронным жестом обводят массивную конструкцию, поддерживающую силовое поле вокруг ксеноса.{/n} "...что эта версия удушителя блокирует не только излияния энергии из-за вуали, но и физические попытки вторгнуться в ареал его действия. Твоя попытка начать беседу бессмысленна — просто следуй навстречу своей гибели и не мешай мне".

traits.locale_text: "Образец, ты, вероятно, заметил{mf||а}..." {n}Конечности гемункула синхронным жестом обводят массивную конструкцию, поддерживающую силовое поле вокруг ксеноса.{/n} "...что эта версия удушителя блокирует не только излияния энергии из-за вуали, но и физические попытки вторгнуться в ареал его действия. Твоя попытка начать беседу бессмысленно — просто следуй навстречу своей гибели и не мешай мне".
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: "Specimen, as you might have noticed..." {n}The Haemonculus's limbs simultaneously gesture at the massive construct supporting the force field around him.{/n} "...this version of the stifler blocks both the energy that bleeds in from beyond the veil and any physical attempts to intrude inside its range. Your attempt at conversing is pointless — simply continue on the way to your demise and do not disturb me."
languages.original_text: "Образец, ты, вероятно, заметил{mf||а}..." {n}Конечности гемункула синхронным жестом обводят массивную конструкцию, поддерживающую силовое поле вокруг ксеноса.{/n} "...что эта версия удушителя блокирует не только излияния энергии из-за вуали, но и физические попытки вторгнуться в ареал его действия. Твоя попытка начать беседу бессмысленна — просто следуй навстречу своей гибели и не мешай мне".

traits.locale_text: "Specimen, as you might have noticed..." {n}The Haemonculus's limbs simultaneously gesture at the massive construct supporting the force field around him.{/n} "...this version of the stifler blocks both the energy that bleeds in from beyond the veil and any physical attempts to intrude inside its zone of effect. Your attempt at conversing is pointless — simply continue on the way to your demise and do not disturb me."
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

Your attempt at conversing is pointless — simply continue on the way to your demise and do not disturb me."
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: « Spécimen, comme vous l'avez peut-être remarqué... » {n}Les appendices de l'hémoncule désignent d'un même geste la structure massive soutenant le champ de force autour de lui.{/n} « ... cette version du carcan bloque à la fois l'énergie en provenance d'au-delà du voile et toute tentative d'intrusion physique. Il est inutile d'essayer de discuter. Continuez simplement votre chemin vers la mort et tâchez de ne pas me déranger. »
languages.original_text: "Specimen, as you might have noticed..." {n}The Haemonculus's limbs simultaneously gesture at the massive construct supporting the force field around him.{/n} "...this version of the stifler blocks both the energy that bleeds in from beyond the veil and any physical attempts to intrude inside its range. Your attempt at conversing is pointless — simply continue on the way to your demise and do not disturb me."

traits.locale_text: « Spécimen, comme vous l'avez peut-être remarqué... » {n}Les appendices de l'hémoncule désignent d'un même geste la structure massive soutenant le champ de force autour de lui.{/n} « ... cette version du carcan bloque à la fois l'énergie en provenance d'au-delà du voile et toute tentative d'intrusion physique. Il est inutile d'essayer de discuter. Continuez simplement votre chemin vers la mort et tâchez de ne pas me déranger. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: “实验对象，或许你已经注意到了……”{n}血伶人的四肢同时朝周围的力场结构做了个手势。{/n}“……升级过的抑制器既能阻挡来自面纱之外的能量，也能阻挡任何试图侵入力场的物理攻击。你打算和我交谈，这毫无意义。继续踏上你的死亡之路吧，不要再打扰我了。”
languages.original_text: "Specimen, as you might have noticed..." {n}The Haemonculus's limbs simultaneously gesture at the massive construct supporting the force field around him.{/n} "...this version of the stifler blocks both the energy that bleeds in from beyond the veil and any physical attempts to intrude inside its range. Your attempt at conversing is pointless — simply continue on the way to your demise and do not disturb me."

traits.locale_text: “实验对象，或许你已经注意到了……”{n}血伶人的四肢同时朝周围的力场结构做了个手势。{/n}“……升级过的抑制器既能阻挡来自面纱之外的能量，也能阻挡任何试图侵入力场的物理攻击。你打算和我交谈，这毫无意义。继续踏上你的死亡之路吧，不要再打扰我了。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: 「標本よ、気付いているかもしれんが…」{n}ハモンキュラスの同時に動いた手足が、周囲のエネルギーフィールドを支える巨大な構築物を指し示した。{/n}「…この型のスティフラーは、ヴェールの向こうから流入してくるエネルギーも、その範囲内に侵入しようとするあらゆる物理的な試みも遮断する。会話しようとしても無駄だ。俺の邪魔はせず、そのまま死ぬがいい」
languages.original_text: "Specimen, as you might have noticed..." {n}The Haemonculus's limbs simultaneously gesture at the massive construct supporting the force field around him.{/n} "...this version of the stifler blocks both the energy that bleeds in from beyond the veil and any physical attempts to intrude inside its range. Your attempt at conversing is pointless — simply continue on the way to your demise and do not disturb me."

traits.locale_text: 「標本よ、気付いているかもしれんが…」{n}ハモンキュラスの同時に動いた手足が、周囲のエネルギーフィールドを支える巨大な構築物を指し示した。{/n}「…この型のスティフラーは、ヴェールの向こうから流入してくるエネルギーも、その範囲内に侵入しようとするあらゆる物理的な試みも遮断する。会話しようとしても無駄だ。俺の邪魔はせず、そのまま死ぬがいい」
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: "Exemplar, wie Euch vielleicht aufgefallen ist ..." {n}Gleichzeitig gestikuliert der Haemonculus in Richtung des riesigen Konstrukts, das das Kraftfeld um ihn herum aufrechterhält.{/n} "... blockiert diese Version des Unterdrückers sowohl die Energie, die durch den Schleier einströmt, als auch jegliche Versuche, hier physisch einzudringen. Euer Versuch einer Unterredung ist zwecklos – geht einfach weiter Euren Weg ins Verderben und belästigt mich nicht."
languages.original_text: "Specimen, as you might have noticed..." {n}The Haemonculus's limbs simultaneously gesture at the massive construct supporting the force field around him.{/n} "...this version of the stifler blocks both the energy that bleeds in from beyond the veil and any physical attempts to intrude inside its range. Your attempt at conversing is pointless — simply continue on the way to your demise and do not disturb me."

traits.locale_text: "Exemplar, wie Euch vielleicht aufgefallen ist ..." {n}Gleichzeitig gestikuliert der Haemonculus in Richtung des riesigen Konstrukts, das das Kraftfeld um ihn herum aufrechterhält.{/n} "... blockiert diese Version des Unterdrückers sowohl die Energie, die durch den Schleier einströmt, als auch jegliche Versuche, hier physisch einzudringen. Euer Versuch einer Unterredung ist zwecklos – geht einfach weiter Euren Weg ins Verderben und belästigt mich nicht."
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: «Como quizá hayas advertido, espécimen...». {n}Las extremidades del hemónculo señalan simultáneamente al inmenso constructo que sustenta el campo de fuerza que le rodea.{/n} «... esta versión del supresor bloquea las energías que se filtran desde el otro lado del velo, así como todo intento por atravesar físicamente su perímetro de acción. Tu conato de conversación es fútil; limítate a seguir buscando la muerte y no me molestes».
languages.original_text: "Specimen, as you might have noticed..." {n}The Haemonculus's limbs simultaneously gesture at the massive construct supporting the force field around him.{/n} "...this version of the stifler blocks both the energy that bleeds in from beyond the veil and any physical attempts to intrude inside its range. Your attempt at conversing is pointless — simply continue on the way to your demise and do not disturb me."

traits.locale_text: «Como quizá hayas advertido, espécimen...». {n}Las extremidades del hemónculo señalan simultáneamente al inmenso constructo que sustenta el campo de fuerza que le rodea.{/n} «... esta versión del supresor bloquea las energías que se filtran desde el otro lado del velo, así como todo intento por atravesar físicamente su perímetro de acción. Tu conato de conversación es fútil; limítate a seguir buscando la muerte y no me molestes».
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire

languages.text: "Numune, fark etmiş olabileceğin üzere..." {n}Haimonkulus, tüm uzuvlarıyla çevresindeki güç perdesini destekleyen, devasa yapıyı işaret ediyor.{/n} "Baskıların bu versiyonu, hem örtünün ötesinde oluşan enerjiyi hem de kapsamı içerisine girmek için gerçekleştirilen her türlü fiziksel teşebbüsü bloke ediyor. Düşünce alışverişi girişimlerin manasız. Yok oluşuna giden yolda yürümeye devam et ve beni rahatsız etme."
languages.original_text: "Specimen, as you might have noticed..." {n}The Haemonculus's limbs simultaneously gesture at the massive construct supporting the force field around him.{/n} "...this version of the stifler blocks both the energy that bleeds in from beyond the veil and any physical attempts to intrude inside its range. Your attempt at conversing is pointless — simply continue on the way to your demise and do not disturb me."

traits.locale_text: "Örneklem, fark etmiş olabileceğin üzere..." {n}Haimonkulus tüm uzuvlarıyla çevresindeki güç perdesini destekleyen devasa yapıyı işaret ediyor.{/n} "...baskılayıcının bu versiyonu hem örtünün ötesinde oluşan enerjiyi hem de kapsamı içerisine girmek için gerçekleştirilen her türlü fiziksel teşebbüsü bloke ediyor. Düşünce alışverişi girişimlerin manasız. Yok oluşuna giden yolda yürümeye devam et ve beni rahatsız etme."
traits.speaker: DrukhariHaemonculus_MeleeRanged_ReavingTempestSpire
